lead_paragraph: Dr. James Naismith created the original 13 rules for basket ball in 1892, outlining the method of scoring, what constitutes a foul and how to determine which team wins.

headline.print_headline: College Coaches Calling for Consistent Basketball Rules
headline.main: College Coaches Calling for Consistent Basketball Rules
